title: School Page
description: A modern website designed for a school project with dynamic features.

title: Vatrodojava
description: A web application for reporting fires by filling out a form and sending the data to a database, which authorized personnel can review.

title: Elektrogasci movie
description: A video film created to explain the purpose of the Vatrodojava project through humorous and educational scenes of two characters, Zaim and Velija.

title: Volim Te App
description: An Electron app designed for Windows and Linux to calculate the time interval between a selected date and the present.

title: KF interiors
description: A website for a company specializing in custom-made furniture, offering options for designing and assembling furniture.

title: Web Widgetizer
description: A browser extension for Opera and Firefox that manages favorite links, creates separate windows for specific websites, and enhances the browsing experience.

title: BiH Theme
description: A VS Code theme that provides a vibrant coding experience with colors inspired by the Bosnian flag and landscapes.

title: Turbine Tech
description: A website presenting a project on renewable energy, featuring data monitoring from an Arduino device.

title: Vaktija Desklet
description: A Linux Mint Cinnamon widget that pulls data from a Vaktija.ba API and displays it on the desktop with additional configuration options.

title: HAX WOOD
description: A website for a company specializing in custom cabins, wooden houses, and other timber products.

title: Turbine Tech App
description: An application for Windows PC designed to monitor the performance of a hybrid Savonius turbine, offering detailed analyses and real-time insights. Available on Microsoft Store!

title: Vaktija iPhone Widget
description: Scriptable widget for the iPhone that displays Islamic prayer times for Bosnia and Herzegovina and Sandžak.

title: Vaktija360
description: Vaktija360 is a minimalist web app with daily prayer times, local weather, and nearby mosques. It supports PWA and uses three data sources.

title: Boba Boom BH
description: The official website of a company located in Ilijaš, dedicated to distributing halal and vegan-certified bubble teas.

title: Server Homepage
description: It serves system monitoring data (CPU, RAM, Disk, uptime), manages custom links via API, and shows weather information fetched from external services.

title: Boss Group
description: Website for Boss Group (bistro, restaurant, hotel) with interactive menu - built in collaboration with Turbine Tech Development.
